The best value lunch in Beijing I had was at La Bombana. Both the food and service are excellent. The restaurant is beautiful too. The dining experience is memorable.

We had. Wonderful Sunday brunch here. True, it seems a bit pricey for Beijing but it was totally worth it. For 330RMB we had a meat/salmon platter, and egg dish each, beef Wellington and a desert. All delicious. The staff are attentive and friendly and the place has a good wine list. It will not be out last visit.
